path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/OpenLive NFT Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner can change _numTokensSellToAddToLiquidity value
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the _numTokensSellToAddToLiquidity value.

findings.title: Owner can enable/disable limitSell
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable the limitSell feature.

findings.title: Owner can mint
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to mint tokens.

findings.title: Owner can enable/disable mint
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable mint functionality.

findings.title: Owner can enable/disable antibot and swap whitelist
findings.description: The owner has privileges to enable or disable antibot and swap whitelist, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change fee value and wallet address
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the fee value and wallet address.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade due to owner privileges even after renouncement
findings.description: The contract owner can retake privileges even after ownership was renounced, allowing potential unauthorized script upgrades.
findings.function: lock(), unlock(), setAntiBot(), setSwapWhiteList(), transferToken(), modifyWhiteListBot(), changeFeeWallet(), changeFee(), modifyWhiteListPool(), setNumTokensSell(), setLimitSell()
